kDesc

Donning her iconic combat ready outfit complete with rounded sunglasses and military cap. This is a full body outfit. Armée de son emblématique tenue de combat, avec ses lunettes de soleil rondes et sa casquette militaire. Il s'agit d'un costume intégral. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. In ihrem Kult-Kampfoutfit mit runder Sonnenbrille und Militärkappe. Dies ist ein Ganzkörperoutfit. Indossa il suo iconico completo da combattimento, insieme agli occhiali da sole arrotondati e al cappellino militare. Si tratta di un completo. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. Un icónico atuendo, listo para el combate y completo con gafas de sol redondas y gorra militar. Es un atuendo de cuerpo entero. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.
